alert.note: Alert for Charlotte (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 17 at 2:48AM EST until December 17 at 3:15AM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Charlotte County in southwestern Florida... * Until 315 AM EST. * At 248 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Punta Gorda, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Punta Gorda, Burnt Store Marina, Pirate Harbor, Solana, Charlotte County Airport, Tropical Gulf Acres, Harbour Heights, Charlotte Park, Cleveland, and Babcock Webb Wma. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
